column2: Intel's CEO looks to hobbyists for wearable innovations SAN MATEO
column4: May 17 Intel Corp's  Chief Executive Officer Brian Krzanich mingled with electronics buffs at Silicon Valley's annual maker mecca on Saturday as the chipmaker looks to amateur inventors to inspire a new wave of smart clothing. ~

column2: Lockheed machinists on strike at Mississippi space center WASHINGTON
column3: May 16 Lockheed Martin Corp  on Friday said it was disappointed that just over 100 union-represented workers at a Mississippi space center had decided to go on strike after rejecting the company's contract offer. The company said it hoped to resolve the issue soon. ~
